name: Beta Quest
description:
This is an MMORPG im working on its still a WIP and i haven't thought of a good name for it yet if you have any ideas or find any bugs feel free to post a comment.

Please also consider filling out this review to help me make the game better https://drive.google.com/open?id=1cm-OeZFdBwtXxg2TS2dlTp64BPriZG7cN6WmO--Ir0M

Also here is the discord server if you want to join that: https://discord.gg/vKqN9NC

Beta 1.0.3

Made non local player movement and animation less choppy

added pause menu with a quit button

made npc interaction exit when the player walks away

other bug fixes
